lead_paragraph: To the Editor: In "California's Experiment on Your Schools" (Op-Ed, Oct. 30), Jonathan Schorr says there's no proof that vouchers work, so let's not try them. Yet there's ample proof that public schools are not working for many of the families who are paying taxes to have children educated by them.

headline.main: School Voucher Plans Don't Improve Education; Benefits of Choice
